title: [Epidemiology] Based on seroprevalence sampling, an estimated 113,842 persons aged <18 years in Mississippi might have been infected with SARS-CoV-2 by mid-September 2020. The number of COVID-19 cases reported in this age group through August 31, 2020 was 8,993.
[Epidemiology] Study shows that medical mistrust, social concern, and race were significantly associated with decreased COVID-19 vaccine acceptance by participants
